特記事項: 【合併】Intercultural Communication（総合政策学部）/異文化間コミュニケーション論（総合政策学部）
授業方法:
This course will be taught face-to-face. Every content lecture will be based on an academic English reading (usually 8 - 15 pages) and consist of an in-person lecture supported by PowerPoint slides and student notetaking. Three lessons will be designated for Unit Tests, and the final lesson will be designated for course review and completion of the Reflective Writing Assignment.

All course reading and handout materials will be distributed to students via the course LUNA site. Students are expected to access and use electronic course materials on their own. No printed materials will be provided.

第1回:
*All 14 classes will be taught face-to-face.
Course Introduction
第14回: Review course materials and compete the Reflective Writing Assignment
トピック.授業計画1: Most weekly sessions will follow a similar pattern. Students will carefully read an academic English text, attend the in-person lecture, and take notes. Three sessions are designated to complete the three Unit Tests. Instead of a course Final Exam, students will complete the Reflective Written Assignment in the final session.

評価.教科書Required texts0: All reading materials will be provided by the instructor on LUNA. Students can expect approximately 8-15 pages of academic English reading preparation per week.
評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0: Ting-Toomey, S., & Chung, L. C. (2012). Understanding Intercultural Communication (2nd Ed.). Oxford University Press: New York.
